#We can see that there exist nan value in children column

source.c350f22d: From the graph we can see that most booking happend at city hotel and at resort hotel cancelation is less as compared to city hotel.
source.0a21b686:
From graph we can see that from May to August average daily rate of Resort type hotel was high.
For City hotel average daily rate was high during the month March,April and May.
source.5c2b3cfb: > **From the graph we can see majority of bookings were not canceled but some half of the bookings were canceled**
